sentiment_analysis_ready_data.original_text: unfortunately the weak bass is kind of a dealbreaker for me. even the Airpods Pro2's bass is too weak. I bought one pair for my gf, I tried them and got real disappointed with the severe lack of bass. Even my $60 aukey buds from like 7 years ago and redmi 4 pro have way stronger basses. I had Pro1 before and thought Pro2 was gonna improve the bass, but nope, still so weak I wanna cry.. now that airpods4 have even weaker bass than Pro2, I don't think it's gonna be sufficient for me.. which is a damn shame 'cause I really want open tip buds without the rubbers, and I like its microphone quality and the squeeze controls..
